Literature.Title: In vitro and in vivo activities of antimicrobial peptides developed using an amino acid-based activity prediction method.
Literature.Author: Wu X, Wang Z, Li X, Fan Y, He G, Wan Y, Yu C, Tang J, Li M, Zhang X, Zhang H, Xiang R, Pan Y, Liu Y, Lu L, Yang L

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=32µg/ml),Salmonella enterica serovar Typhimurium(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=16-32µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=32->128µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=16-64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=32-64µg/ml)
